text.div: • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 223366009 (Healthcare professional)

name: PerformerVS
title: Performer value set
description: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values that contains terms that represent the role of the performer who was responsible for asserting the observed value as true.
